name: jccil
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
comment: Inference conjoining a consequent of a consequent to the left of the consequent in an implication. Remark: One can also prove this theorem using ~ syl and ~ jca (as done in ~ jccir ), which would be 4 bytes shorter, but one step longer than the current proof. (Proof modification is discouraged.) (Contributed by AV, 20-Aug-2019.)
